issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Setter of xxxxPBImpl doesn't really set the collection, but append its items to an existing collection

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: Fix synchronization issues of the setters/getters of *PBImpl which take in/return lists

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description: Some of the APIs take in lists and the setter-APIs don't always do proper synchronization. We need to fix these.
fields.summary: Fix synchronization issues in APIs which take in lists

comments.body:
Several set functions in these APIs has list or map parameters:
ContainerLaunchContext
PreemptionContract
QueueInfo
QueueUserACLInfo
ResourceBlacklistRequest
AllocateRequest
AllocateResponse
GetClusterNodesResponse
GetQueueUserAclsInfoResponse
RegisterApplicationMasterResponse
StartContainerResponse
GetApplicationsRequest
GetApplicationsResponse

  against trunk revision .

The patch looks good to me, but would you please include 4 more *PBImpls which are in server api package and take in lists?

1. NodeHeartbeatResponsePBImpl
2. NodeStatusPBImpl
3. LocalizerHearbeatResponsePBImpl
4. LocalizerStatusPBImpl

Since it's not much else, I think it's good to fix together here.

Checked the three methods bellow. Though they're called "addAll*", they seem to be used just as the setter in the context. Would you please check the references of them as well? If they're supposed to be the setter, I think it's good to modify the implementation as you did for other setters.

* NodeHeartbeatResponsePBImpl#addAllContainersToCleanup
* NodeHeartbeatResponsePBImpl#addAllApplicationsToCleanup
* LocalizerStatusPBImpl#addAllResources
Verified, they are used just as the setter.
